name: InfluenzaOrganTransplantICD10
title: Influenza Organ Transplant ICD10
description: This value set contains non-solid organ transplant ICD10 codes needed for the IMM2 measure that are not included in the Lantana Organ Transplant value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains procedures for patients who have had  an organ transplant.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had an organ transplant. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes representing procedure for organ transplant using the ICD10 code systems.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria should be excluded.)
